cards.title: Hot mic catches Putin and Xi discussing organ transplants and immortality
cards.summary: Vladimir Putin was in Beijing with Chinese leader Xi Jinping for a military parade. State media aired live footage that captured parts of what appeared to be a private conversation. Putin’s interpreter could be heard saying in Chinese: “Biotechnology is continuously developing” After a brief inaudible passage, the interpreter added: ‘The longer you live, the younger you become, and [you can] even achieve immortality’

cards.title: What we know about fatal Lisbon funicular derailment
cards.summary: Crash occurred at around 18:05 on Wednesday, near Lisbon's Avenida da Liberdade. At least 15 people have been killed and 18 more injured, some critically. It is not yet clear what caused the carriage to derail.

cards.title: Putin says Russia will achieve all aims militarily if Ukraine does not agree dea…
cards.summary: Putin says Russia will achieve all aims militarily if Ukraine does not agree deal. Russia launched a full-scale invasion of its neighbour in February 2022. US president has tried to persuade Putin to end the war, but the Russian leader has so far not done so.
